spatial_accuracy.notes: Generally good room placement, but significant errors in door orientation and several missing internal doors. Window placements are mostly consistent with the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Internal wall segments are included but many door openings (archways) are rendered as solid wall gaps without door frames or consistent orientation. Adjacency is preserved.

furniture_mapping.notes: Highly accurate furniture replication including kitchen islands, dining arrangements, and bedroom layouts. Excellent scale consistency.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric projection with consistent lighting and professional-grade geometry. Minimal rendering artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Missing swing doors for several rooms (bathroom and bedroom entrances), rendered as open gaps.
Incorrect orientation of the entrance door at the bottom of the plan; rendered as a divided opening rather than a double-swing entry.
The kitchen countertop depth and island placement slightly deviated from the layout proportions.
Small hallucinated wall segment near the top center bathroom/bedroom partition.
